title: Bon Voyage, Charlie Brown (1980) 1080p AC3 (5.1) HDTV
description:
This is my own rip.  The source was TCM, and they have a very large safe area, so although the transmission was 1080p, not every line was used.  But, it's still better than 720p or the VHS (which is the only version available for home video).

There is a small logo for 20 seconds every 30 minutes.
